   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_eqc_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: %% Common test
   27: -export([all/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_testcase/2
   32:         ]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases
   35: -export([tls_handshake_encoding/1,
   36:          tls_cipher_suite_names/1,
   37:          tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names/1,
   38:          tls_anon_cipher_suite_names/1,
   39:          tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names/1,
   40:          tls_signature_algs/1,
   41:          tls_unorded_chains/1,
   42:          tls_extraneous_chain/1,
   43:          tls_extraneous_chains/1,
   44:          tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains/1,
   45:          tls_client_cert_auth/1,
   46:          tls_eccs/1
   47:          ]).
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: 
   53: all() -> 
   54:     [
   55:      tls_handshake_encoding,
   56:      tls_cipher_suite_names,
   57:      tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names,
   58:      tls_anon_cipher_suite_names,
   59:      tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names,
   60:      tls_signature_algs,
   61:      tls_unorded_chains,
   62:      tls_extraneous_chain,
   63:      tls_extraneous_chains,
   64:      tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains,
   65:      tls_client_cert_auth,
   66:      tls_eccs
   67:     ].
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   71:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
   72:     catch application:stop(crypto),
   73:     try application:start(crypto) of
   74: 	ok ->
   75:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   76:             ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config)
   77:     catch _:_ ->
   78: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   79:     end.
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   82:     ssl:stop(),
   83:     application:stop(crypto).
   84: 
   85: init_per_testcase(_, Config0) ->
   86:     Config0.
   87: 
   88: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: 
   95: tls_handshake_encoding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_hs_encode_decode()).
   97:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_hs_encode_decode(),
   98:                                         Config).
   99: 
  100: tls_cipher_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  101:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name()).
  102:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name(),
  103:                                         Config).
  104: 
  105: tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name()).
  107:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name(),
  108:                                         Config).
  109: tls_anon_cipher_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name()).
  111:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_anon_cipher_suite_rfc_name(),
  112:                                         Config).
  113: 
  114: tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name()).
  116:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_anon_cipher_suite_openssl_name(),
  117:                                         Config).
  118: 
  119: tls_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_signature_algs()).
  121:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_signature_algs(),
  122:                                         Config).
  123: 
  124: tls_unorded_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path("/tmp")
  126:     ssl:start(),
  127:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  128:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_unordered_path(PrivDir),
  129:                                         Config).
  130: 
  131: tls_extraneous_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path("/tmp")
  133:     ssl:start(),
  134:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  135:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_path(PrivDir),
  136:                                         Config).
  137: 
  138: tls_extraneous_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path()
  140:     ssl:start(),
  141:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_paths(),
  142:                                        Config).
  143: tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  144:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path()
  145:     ssl:start(),
  146:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_and_unordered_path(),
  147:                                        Config).
  148: 
  149: tls_client_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  150:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_client_cert_auth()
  151:     ssl:start(),
  152:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_client_cert_auth(),
  153:                                        Config).
  154: tls_eccs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_ecc:prop_tls_ecc)
  156:     ssl:start(),
  157:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_ecc:prop_tls_ecc(),
  158:                                        Config).
